Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1004.w.caption: In the soft light of early morning, tribal farmers and a Village Social Transformation Foundation (VSTF) fellow gather at the edge of a communal vegetable garden to discuss the season’s produce.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1165.w.caption: In a sun-drenched school courtyard, a group of young girls in matching maroon uniforms focus intently on a game of Lingorcha (also known as Lagori).

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1258.w.caption: Inside a brightly lit vocational center, a group of young women participate in a professional tailoring workshop in Gadchiroli, Maharashtra.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1263.w.caption: An elderly father and his two daughters take a brief moment of rest while working at a rural development site under the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA).

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-137.we.caption: A VSTF fellow and an SHG member carefully monitor the progress of a mushroom crop in Gadchiroli, Maharashtra.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-141.we.caption: A bird’s-eye view of the Gadchiroli landscape, where the finished labor of MGNREGA workers has carved structured bunds and leveled fields, ready for the next planting season.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1410.w.caption: A local woman stands proudly behind the counter of her well-stocked grocery shop (Kirana store), which serves as a vital commercial hub for her village in Gadchiroli, Maharashtra.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1419.w.caption: A group of village women, some accompanied by their children, gather on the floor of a local community center for a foundational meeting to form a Self-Help Group (SHG).

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1573.w.caption: Inside a community-run library, local men and a young student browse a collection of new books in a village in Gadchiroli, Maharashtra.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1792.w.caption: A group of schoolgirls in white uniforms erupt in laughter during an outdoor activity at a local school.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-1881.w.caption: In a modest rural home, a young tribal girl lies on the floor, focused intently on her schoolwork under the steady glow of a single electric bulb.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-2122.w.caption: Carrying metal basins and walking in a determined line, members of a local Self-Help Group (SHG) make their way through the village outskirts to a community pond they have leased for fish farming.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-235.we.caption: Standing tall beside the village’s elevated water tank, a local worker poses with his tools, in Gadchiroli.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-4.webp.caption: A student in a Gadchiroli classroom confidently answers a question, utilizing an interactive digital board to illustrate her point. Technology is turning passive lessons into active dialogues.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-478.we.caption: A community of farmers in Gadchiroli standing proud before the solar array that powers their collective future.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-635-2..caption: A Village Social Transformation Foundation (VSTF) fellow leads an open, vital conversation about menstrual health and hygiene with schoolgirls in Gadchiroli.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-668.we.caption: Standing in formation at their school in Gadchiroli, these young girls represent a rising generation of scholars determined to rewrite the narrative of their district through education.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-857.we.caption: In the classrooms of Gadchiroli, traditional learning meets modern technology as students master computer skills, bridging the digital divide one click at a time.

Gadchiroli_VSTF_SumitSute_Feb2020-97.web.caption: A Self-Help Group stands before their workshop, representing the backbone of rural transformation in Maharashtra. Together, they turn skills into livelihoods.

Paani Foundation_Training_Vharakatwadi_B.caption: a line of women makes their way across the parched landscape of Beed district to a Paani Foundation training site.
In a powerful display of collective resolve, hundreds of villagers form a massive human circle on a newly terraced hillside during a Paani Foundation training camp.
Under an expansive, clear blue sky, a long, disciplined line of participants—predominantly women—traverses the rugged, undulating terrain of a hilly ridge during a Paani Foundation training camp.
Paani Foundation Training Vharakatwadi By Sumit Sute
A resilient group of women participants gather in a drought-prone village to participate in a Paani Foundation training camp.
Under the shade of village trees, a group of women participants engages in a hands-on technical session during a Paani Foundation training camp.
Beneath the canopy of a pendal, a group of women trainees take notes around a detailed, hand-crafted 3D sand model of their local landscape during a Paani Foundation workshop.
Women participants at a Paani Foundation camp use their smartphones to photograph a detailed 3D watershed model
Inside a brightly decorated community tent, a group of women participants engages in a lively interactive session during a Paani Foundation training camp.
Inside a brightly decorated community tent, a group of women participants engages in a lively interactive session during a Paani Foundation training camp.
Inside a brightly decorated community tent, a group of women participants engages in a lively interactive session during a Paani Foundation training camp.

Under the soft glow of a full moon and portable site lights, women participants at a Paani Foundation training camp continue their technical lessons well into the evening
Armed with pickaxes, shovels, and iron pans, a large group of village women gathers at a designated watershed site for a day of Shramdan (voluntary labor).
In the final stages of their technical field training, women participants at a Paani Foundation camp work in small teams to master the use of measuring tapes and spirit levels.
In a powerful display of community-led engineering, a group of women laborers work together on a hilly terrain to dig Continuous Contour Trenches (CCTs).
Under the midday sun, women participants at a Paani Foundation training camp work in synchronized teams keep their spirits high.
